parameters.name: EventBusName
parameters.description: The name of the event bus.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to be returned in a call. You can use this parameter and NextToken to implement paging. Note: Up to 100 entries can be returned in a call.

parameters.name: NamePrefix
parameters.description: The name of the event source.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: If you configure Limit and excess return values exist, this parameter is returned.
